00001 #include <ros/ros.h>
00002 #include <sensor_msgs/Joy.h>
00003 
00004 #include "last_letter_msgs/SimPWM.h"
00005 
00006 ros::Publisher pub;
00007 
00008 void joy2chan(sensor_msgs::Joy joyMsg)
00009 {
00010         last_letter_msgs::SimPWM channels;
00011         channels.value[0] = (unsigned int)(-joyMsg.axes[0]*500+ 1500);
00012         channels.value[1] = (unsigned int)(-joyMsg.axes[1]*500+ 1500);
00013         channels.value[2] = (unsigned int)((joyMsg.axes[3]+1)*500+ 1000);
00014         channels.value[3] = (unsigned int)(-joyMsg.axes[2]*500+ 1500);
00015         channels.value[9] = (unsigned int)(joyMsg.buttons[5]*1000 + 1000); // Reset channel
00016         channels.value[5] = (unsigned int)(joyMsg.buttons[0]*1000 + 1000); // Breaks channel
00017         channels.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
00018         pub.publish(channels);
00019 }
00020 
00021 int main(int argc, char **argv)
00022 {
00023         ros::init(argc, argv, "joystick_node");
00024         ros::NodeHandle n;
00025         ros::Subscriber sub = n.subscribe("joy",1,joy2chan);
00026         pub = n.advertise<last_letter_msgs::SimPWM>("rawPWM",1);
00027 
00028         while (ros::ok())
00029         {
00030                 ros::spin();
00031         }
00032 
00033         return 0;
00034 }
